title: 98/15/EC: Commission Decision of 4 December 1997 amending the definitions of the less-favoured areas in Austria within the meaning of Regulation (EC) No 950/97 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 4 December 1997 amending the definitions of the less-favoured areas in Austria within the meaning of Regulation (EC) No 950/97 (Only the German text is authentic) (98/15/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in Austria given in the Annex to Directive 95/212/EC is hereby supplemented by the list given in Annex I hereto and amended by the list of topographical areas reclassified or withdrawn as given in Annex II hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Austria.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 December 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 142, 2. 6. 1997, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 137, 21. 6. 1995, p. 1.
